titleStmt.title: Britania triumphalis; a brief history of the vvarres and other state-affairs of Great Britain. From the death of the late King, to the dissolution of the last Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Howes, and are to be sold at at [sic] his shop in Popes-head-Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
